trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The ungainly guardsman has made a fine mess of things.
TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_TODO_00<tab>Defeat the proterosuchus and retrieve the guardsman's sack.
TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the sack to the ungainly guardsman.

TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SOLDIER03436_000_000<tab>Oh, curse my clumsy feet! I've really done it this time! I was on my way back from an assignment in Weathering, when─would you believe it?─I slipped and fell, sending the sack I was carrying flying out of my hand and high into the heavens.

TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SOLDIER03436_000_001<tab>And as if that wasn't bad enough, a massive beast from out of nowhere snatched up my precious belongings in its jaws and carried them off to the gods know where!
TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SOLDIER03436_000_002<tab>Suffice to say that if I return empty-handed, my commanding officer is like as not to put me on privy cleaning duty for a week! You must help me, friend!

TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SOLDIER03436_000_010<tab>Welcome back, friend! You found my supplies, yes? Oh, please say that you did! Just the thought of scouring the privy with a toothbrush again is sending shivers down my spine!
TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SOLDIER03436_000_011<tab>Could it be? Oh, but it is─my sack! My lovely, lovely sack! And though it's looking rather worse for wear, the contents appear to be entirely intact!

TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SOLDIER03436_000_012<tab>What exactly <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> the contents, you ask? Among other things, there happens to be a remarkable device that's been entrusted to us in the guard by the Crystal Exarch himself, who is said to have exhumed it from the Crystal Tower!

TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SOLDIER03436_000_013<tab>Though it simply looks like a pretty round gemstone, it somehow has the ability to measure the concentration of aether in the air and matter around us. Needless to say, it's not something that anyone─not even the artisans at the Mean─can just toss together. If I had lost it for good...

TEXT_LUCKZE002_03436_SOLDIER03436_000_014<tab>...But thanks to you, I don't have to think about that anymore, now do I? I know it isn't much, but please take this as a token of my thanks. And with that, I'd best hurry back, lest I get punished anyway for my tardiness. Fare thee well!
